headline: Allegion (ALLE) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of security hardware provider Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) fell 1% in the afternoon session after the major indices continued to retreat (Nasdaq -1.5%, S&P 500 -1.2%) amid profit-taking and renewed concerns about tariffs.
